code:
%% Stand-up Meeting Reality by emphonic.com
%% The daily scrum experience of every developer

journey
    title Daily Stand-up Meeting Reality
    section Before Stand-up
      Check Slack for fires: 2: Dev
      Pretend to remember yesterday: 1: Dev
      Make coffee: 5: Dev
    section The Stand-up
      Say worked on same ticket: 3: Dev
      Mention blockers no one fixes: 2: Dev
      Hear PM add urgent feature: 1: Dev, PM
      Watch 15-min meeting hit 45-min: 1: Everyone
    section After Stand-up
      Actually start working: 4: Dev
      Get pulled into another meeting: 1: Dev
      Debug why prod is down: 1: Dev, Ops
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 主架构 这一块。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 '主架构'？
